types.type:
<prop type="function(!Array=): string" name="charset"> Returns the most preferred charset from the client.
<prop type="function(!Array=): !Array" name="charsets"> Returns an array of preferred charsets ordered by the client preference.
<prop type="function(!Array=): string" name="encoding"> Returns the most preferred encoding from the client.
<prop type="function(!Array=): !Array" name="encodings"> Returns an array of preferred encodings ordered by the client preference.
<prop type="function(!Array=): string" name="language"> Returns the most preferred language from the client.
<prop type="function(!Array=): !Array" name="languages"> Returns an array of preferred languages ordered by priority from a list of available languages.
<prop type="function(!Array=): string" name="mediaType"> Returns the most preferred media type from the client.
<prop type="function(!Array=): !Array" name="mediaTypes"> Returns an array of preferred media types ordered by priority from a list of available media types.
